sentences.english: I need a brochure for a water-engineering firm based in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 我需要在内罗毕，肯尼亚的节水型工程公司的小册子。

sentences.english: Illegal weapons are set aflame in Nairobi, Kenya.
sentences.chinese: 在内罗毕非法枪支被销毁，肯尼亚。

sentences.english: Naivasha to Nairobi, Kenya's road is one of the busiest highways .
sentences.chinese: 奈瓦沙到内罗毕的公路是肯尼亚最繁忙的公路之一。

sentences.english: A girl stood outside a school in the Mukuru kwa Njenga slum in Nairobi, Kenya, Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 一名小女孩站在贫民区学校的墙外，内罗毕，肯尼亚。

sentences.english: Take Kibera a poor neighborhood in Nairobi.
sentences.chinese: 以内罗毕的一个社区基贝拉为例。

sentences.english: They had gathered in large numbers to welcome him back from Nairobi Photograph: Tony Karumba/AFP/Getty Images
sentences.chinese: 这些支持者大批聚集于此，迎候他从内罗毕归来。

sentences.english: Some of the cases from Central Province were diagnosed in Nairobi.
sentences.chinese: 中央省的一些病例是在内罗毕诊断的。

sentences.english: She said, "We are the first group of students in the Confucius Institute in Nairobi.
sentences.chinese: 她说，我们是内罗毕孔子学院的第一批学生。

sentences.english: A child interacts with a baby elephant at the David Sheldrick Wildlife Trust headquarters and elephant orphanage in Nairobi, November 10, 2008.
sentences.chinese: 一个小孩正和肯尼亚内罗毕大象孤儿院的小象玩耍。

pinyin: Ya4 di4 si1 Ya4 bei4 ba1

definition: Dar es Salaam (former capital of Tanzania)
pinyin: Da2 lei4 si1 Sa4 la1 mu3
